workingpoints: Trained on React JS and IOS App Development
Introduced to RESTful web services and a tool called Microsoft Flow
Build a web application using IMDb API using React JS
Worked as Junior Developer for one of the client where we successfully integrated the vendor API's using a tool called Microsoft Flow
Part of a team for creating a proof of concept for a internal project using React JS as front-end and Java Spring-Boot for backend
Chosen from numerous candidates for this position, hired based on personality, communication and interpersonal skills
Acted as a bridge between students and companies
Organised a college fest Brain Wreck for juniors
Acted as Student Coordinator for Coders' Club in our college where we conducted numerous coding contests

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce web application where users can order products by registering in the site.

projects.name: BlogIN
projects.description: A full-stack web application where users can post an article or view articles posted by others. Users can like or dislike articles posted by others. Provided authentication and authorization for the website.

projects.name: SellIt Buyit
projects.description: A full-stack web application like OLX where users can sell things or buy things. Added a feature to show things based on location.

projects.name: Contact Form Application
projects.description: A desktop application using python tkinter package to collect details from users.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: A portfolio website which helps to show my professional journey and showcase my technical skills

projects.name: URL Shortener
projects.description: Build an URL shortener application by following a online webinar

projects.name: Shopping List
projects.description: Build an Shoping list application where users can add items along with thier prices. User can perform all CRUD operations in the application. For styling, I used Materialize css

projects.name: chat application
projects.description: Build a chat application by following a udemy course. Used socket.io for bi-directional data flow.

projects.name: Miniblog Application
projects.description: A blog application where users can view the articles posted by the admin.
